remarks: A closed interval in ` RR ` is bounded.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
iccbnd.1 $e |- J = ( A [,] B ) $.
iccbnd.2 $e |- M = ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( J X. J ) ) $.
iccbnd $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> M e. ( Bnd ` J ) ) $.
